description: We've all seen those blue collar guys...the mechanic in the coveralls, the driver in tight, faded jeans at the truck stop, the delivery guy in uniform that looked kind of skinny, kind of scruffy, but was packing a basket you made your cock hard in spite of yourself and made it impossible to take your eye off the prize. He has us squirming in our own shorts, dying to see what was inside when he finally sent all nine inches out the fly like a tree trunks growing off the side of the mountain. A small, sexy happy trail on that flat stomach led the way to a full, natural untrimmed bush...when you are hung like Jack, you don't need to trim the grass to show off the real estate...even a blind man could tell he is just huge with a matching set of oversized babymakers that sway in their sack like a couple of balling balls looking for a bigger home.
title: Measuring UP!, Scene #01
